name: Wash & Fold
shortDescription: Professional washing, drying, and folding of your everyday clothes.
fullDescription: Our Wash & Fold service is perfect for your everyday clothing items like t-shirts, jeans, socks, and underwear. We separate colors and whites, wash with premium detergents, dry on appropriate settings, and fold with care. Your clothes will come back fresh, clean, and ready to wear or store.

name: Dry Cleaning
shortDescription: Expert dry cleaning for delicate and special-care garments.
fullDescription: Our professional dry cleaning service uses eco-friendly solvents to safely clean your delicate garments. Perfect for suits, dresses, silk blouses, wool sweaters, and other items that require special care. We inspect each item before cleaning and handle with the utmost attention to detail.

name: Press Only
shortDescription: Professional pressing to remove wrinkles and refresh your clothes.
fullDescription: For clothes that are clean but need freshening up, our Press Only service will have them looking crisp and professional. Our skilled pressers use commercial-grade equipment to remove wrinkles and restore shape to your garments without washing.
bestFor: Dress shirts, pants, skirts, lightly worn garments

name: Delicates Hand Wash
shortDescription: Gentle hand washing for your most delicate items.
fullDescription: Some items require extra special care. Our Delicates Hand Wash service provides gentle cleaning by hand for items like lingerie, silk garments, cashmere sweaters, and other fragile fabrics. We use mild detergents and air dry to preserve the integrity of your delicate items.

name: Stain Removal
shortDescription: Professional stain treatment for tough spots and spills.
fullDescription: Our stain removal experts treat stubborn stains before cleaning to give your garments the best chance of coming clean. We identify stain types and use appropriate treatments to safely remove them without damaging fabrics. Additional charge applies only if stain is successfully removed.
bestFor: Wine stains, grease, ink, makeup, etc.

name: Alterations & Repairs
fullDescription: Our skilled tailors can handle a variety of alterations and repairs including hemming, taking in/letting out, zipper replacement, button replacement, and more. Pricing varies based on the specific work needed - consult with our staff for an estimate.
bestFor: Pants hemming, sleeve shortening, waist adjustments

name: Bulk Laundry
shortDescription: Economical option for large quantities of laundry.
fullDescription: For customers with large quantities of laundry (15+ lbs), our Bulk Laundry service offers a discounted rate. All items are washed, dried, and folded with the same care as our regular service, just at a better price point for volume.

name: Comforters & Blankets
fullDescription: We clean comforters, quilts, blankets, and other bulky bedding items in extra-large capacity machines. Items are thoroughly cleaned and dried to eliminate allergens and odors. Price is per item.

name: Leather & Suede
shortDescription: Specialized cleaning for leather and suede garments.
fullDescription: Our leather and suede cleaning service uses specialized techniques to clean and condition these delicate materials. Each item is individually assessed and treated to preserve color, texture, and finish. Price varies based on item size and type.
bestFor: Leather jackets, suede skirts, leather pants

name: Wedding Gown Preservation
shortDescription: Professional cleaning and preservation for wedding dresses.
fullDescription: Our wedding gown preservation service begins with thorough cleaning to remove stains and discoloration. The gown is then carefully packaged in an acid-free preservation box with tissue to prevent yellowing, allowing it to be stored for decades while maintaining its beauty.
bestFor: Wedding dresses, bridesmaid dresses, formal gowns

name: Shoe Cleaning
fullDescription: We clean and polish leather shoes, sneakers, and other footwear to restore their appearance. Service includes cleaning, deodorizing, and polishing as appropriate for the shoe material. Does not include repairs.

name: Curtains & Drapes
fullDescription: We clean curtains, drapes, and other window treatments to remove dust, odors, and stains. Items are carefully handled to prevent shrinkage or damage. Price varies based on size and material.

name: Area Rug Cleaning
fullDescription: Our area rug cleaning service thoroughly cleans and deodorizes rugs up to 8x10 feet. Rugs are gently washed and dried to prevent damage to fibers and backing. Pickup and delivery available for an additional charge.
bestFor: Oriental rugs, wool rugs, synthetic rugs

name: Express Service
shortDescription: Faster turnaround for your laundry needs.
fullDescription: Need your items back sooner? Our Express Service guarantees return within 24 hours for laundry and 48 hours for dry cleaning. Additional charge is per order, not per item. Subject to availability.
bestFor: When you need items back quickly

name: Subscription Service
shortDescription: Weekly or bi-weekly scheduled laundry service.
fullDescription: Our subscription service offers regularly scheduled pickups and deliveries for your laundry needs. Choose weekly or bi-weekly service and enjoy discounted rates and priority processing. Perfect for busy professionals and families.
